page.content: The simulators take the form of the cockpit of an aircraft and are used to train pilots.The visual system of the simulators are now all computorised ,where as they used to be done with models.The visual system of a simulator is all computorised.When the simulator moves at exactly the same time.The computer is able to project an image of day or night. The simulator moves on six different legs which are connected to three pistons which moves the simulator on six axis (UP,DOWN,LEFT,RIGHT and two diagonals.)At Link Miles they actually produce classroom simulators,which are simulators that are literally cut in half.The simulators are placed in front of them so that the pupils have a full view inside the cockpit. Compiled by A.Bright,T.Chadwick & N.Bailey,IRENE AVENUE C.MIDDLE SCHOOL.
